Package com.capgemini.wsb.fitnesstracker.user.api

Interface UserProvider

All Known Implementing Classes:
UserServiceImpl
public interface UserProvider

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<User>
    findAllUsers()
    Retrieves all users.
    List<User>
    findUsersByEmail(String email)
    Finds and returns a list of users with the specified email.

  • Method Details

    • getUser

      Optional<User> getUser(Long userId)
      Retrieves a user based on their ID. If the user with given ID is not found, then Optional.empty() will be returned.
      Parameters:
      userId - id of the user to be searched
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the located user, or Optional.empty() if not found

    • getUserByEmail

      Optional<User> getUserByEmail(String email)
      Retrieves a user based on their email. If the user with given email is not found, then Optional.empty() will be returned.
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the user to be searched
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the located user, or Optional.empty() if not found

    • findAllUsers

      List<User> findAllUsers()
      Retrieves all users.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the all users,

    • findUsersByEmail

      List<User> findUsersByEmail(String email)
      Finds and returns a list of users with the specified email.
      Parameters:
      email - the email address of the users to search for
      Returns:
      a list of users with the specified email

    • findUsersByMinAge

      List<User> findUsersByMinAge(int minAge)
      Finds and returns a list of users with the specified minimum age.
      Parameters:
      minAge - the minimum age of the users to search for
      Returns:
      a list of users with the specified minimum age
